biotools.summary: Multi-layer protein comparison meta-server that computes structure similarities using various information theory measures. It integrates various protein similarity measures through an easy to use interface that allows the comparison of multiple proteins simultaneously. Based on a diverse set of similarity measures computes a consensus similarity profile for the entire protein set. All results can be clustered, visualised, analysed.
